typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{A単o} as string,
		Marca as string,
		{Total del producto} as string,
		{Cantidad de productos} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> saBRANDORDERS
source(output(
		{A単o} as string,
		Marca as string,
		{Total del producto} as decimal(15,2),
		{Cantidad de productos} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dboBRANDORDERS
saBRANDORDERS, dboBRANDORDERS join(saBRANDORDERS@{A単o} == dboBRANDORDERS@{A単o}
	&& saBRANDORDERS@Marca == dboBRANDORDERS@Marca,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Combinacion1
